content: this easy blissful baby blanket crochet pattern is a delight to make and looks stunning when complete wait until you see your new bundle of joy wrapped snuggly in this soft warm yet lightweight gorgeous blanket it s an ideal size and fabric there are no large holes for a newborn baby and it s universally radiant perfect for any gender the pattern includes easy-to-follow instructions with helpful diagrams and a step-by-step video tutorial featuring simple and beginner-friendly stitches the entire pattern is made with only single and double_crochet stitches and an easy one-row-repeat this enjoyable and rewarding pattern creates a truly special blanket destined to become a treasured keepsake additional details skill level easy and beginner-friendly size the pattern creates a blanket that is approx 33 x 33 instructions for adjusting the size are included in the pattern yarn any size 3 light yarn you will need approx 1 200 yds in total i used baby cuddles by loops & threads in the color white this yarn is size 3 light 70% acrylic and 30% polyamide a skein is 315 yds / 288 m and 4 oz / 113 g i used four skeins in total approx 1 000 yds for the blanket body and 200 yds for the blanket border crochet hook size i/9 5 50 mm can i use a different yarn weight or hook size this pattern was designed using size 3 light yarn and an i/9 5 50 mm hook you are welcome to try different yarn weights as well as hook sizes but the overall look feel and size of the blanket as well as the amount of yarn required may be different i really wish i could help and tell you how to make the pattern with a different yarn weight and/or hook size but i ve only designed made and tested the pattern with the yarn weight and hook size listed and i wouldn t want to give you inaccurate information other materials scissors yarn needle and a measuring tape terminology written in english for right-handed crochet using standard us crochet terminology
